name: StackExtended
tagline: A list of userscripts and extensions for Stack Exchange
body:
#Main site

 - [Stack Overflow Extras](http://stackapps.com/questions/6091) by [ᔕᖺᘎᕊ][Shub]

 Adds a whole lot of extra functionality and options to Stack Exchange. [Full list here](https://github.com/soscripted/sox/wiki/Features)
 - [Sidebar comments](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/comments-in-sidebar/fojkncjknkcndbglhlfaenlkngflapeb) by [Normal Human][Normal Human]

 Displays recent comments in the sidebar.
 - [AutoReviewComments](https://github.com/Benjol/SE-AutoReviewComments) by [Benjol][Benjol]

 Lets you keep lists of prefill comments to use.
 - [Freehand Circles Drawing Tool](http://stackapps.com/questions/6353) by [ᔕᖺᘎᕊ][Shub]

 Red circles! Drawing stuff!
 - [Threaded comments](http://stackapps.com/questions/2050) by [balpha][balpha]

 Threads comments so you can see the logical flow better.

#Review

 - [Review+ Page](https://github.com/normalhuman/ReviewPro/) by [Normal Human]

 Moves review items to the sidebar for better clarity and displays a list of potentially VLQ or problem questions.
 - [Review Stalker Reloaded](http://stackapps.com/questions/6869) by [Nathan Tuggy][Nathan Tuggy]

 Lets you keep one tab of /review open that jumps around to all the other sites that you can review on.
 - [Audit Detector](https://github.com/normalhuman/AuditDetector) by [Normal Human][Normal Human]

 Shows you when you're getting audited.

#Chat

 - [Porkchat](http://stackapps.com/questions/6266) by [Fredley][Fredley]

 Chat plugin containing Dark Theme, Keyboard Shortcuts and Rebecca Black + Image protection
 - [Star Image Unthumbnailer](https://github.com/MadaraUchiha/star-thumn) by [Madara Uchiha][Madara Uchiha]

 Unthumbnails images in the star wall
 - [Chatception](https://github.com/KeyboardFire/stackexchange-chatception) by [KeyboardFire][Keyboard Fire]

 Lets you chat on multiple chat rooms from one room.
 - [Sevichat](https://github.com/KeyboardFire/sevichat) by [KeyboardFire][Keyboard Fire]

 Adds Vi-like commands to chat
 - [SE Chat Modifications](http://stackapps.com/questions/2105) by [Tim Stone][Tim Stone]

 Adds / like commands to chat
 - [SE Chat Oneboxer](https://github.com/The-Quill/SE-Chat-Oneboxer) by [Quill][Quill]

 Oneboxes a variety of links, like Instagram, Coding Horror, GitHub.
 - [Memer](https://github.com/ismael-miguel/Memer) by [Ismael Miguel][Ismael Miguel]

 Provides a tooltip for terminology specific to sites
 - [Badge Oneboxer](https://github.com/The-Quill/badge-oneboxer) by [Quill][Quill]

 Oneboxes `[badge:whatever]` like the tag oneboxes.

[Normal Human]:https://github.com/normalhuman
[Keyboard Fire]:https://github.com/KeyboardFire
[Shub]:http://stackexchange.com/users/4337810/shub
[Quill]:http://stackexchange.com/users/4000711/quill
[balpha]:http://stackapps.com/users/43/balpha
[Madara Uchiha]:http://anime.stackexchange.com/users/27/madara-uchiha

[Fredley]:https://github.com/fredley
